doc:
Peter Mark Richman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Mark_Richman 0 Peter Mark Richman (born April 16, 1927) is an American actor who has starred in films and on television, who was for many years credited as Mark Richman. He appeared in over 30 films and over 130 television series since the 1950s. Peter_Mark_Richman ( born April_16_,_1927 ) is an_American_actor who has_starred in films and on television , who was for many_years credited as Mark_Richman . He appeared in over_30_films and over 130_television_series since the_1950s .
